createTable.remarks: Holds identification and authentication information about a user.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: The login name of the user

column.name: organisation_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the organisation to which the user belong

column.name: person_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the (physical) person associated with this user (account)

column.name: active_from
column.remarks: The date and time when the user (account) becomes usable

column.name: active_to
column.remarks: The date and time when the user (account) stops being usable

column.name: last_logon
column.remarks: The date and time of the last successful logon

column.name: lockout_to
column.remarks: The date and time when the lockout ends

column.name: password_expiry
column.remarks: The date and time of the (current) password expiry

column.name: lockout_reason
column.remarks: The reason for the lockout of the user (account)

column.name: logon_failure
column.remarks: The number of consecutive logon failures

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who created the entry

column.name: created_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was created

column.name: modified_by
column.remarks: The name of the user who performed the last update on the entry

column.name: modified_on
column.remarks: The date and time the entry was last updated
